wedo_instance.description: Governs the maintenance and evolution of the Metagit's legislative DNA (JSON/WeDo templates).

rules.accumulation: Word count must ALWAYS increase in each iteration.
rules.temporal_instance: Never work in global templates; copy to day's json/ directory.
rules.audit_scrutiny: List all changes/requests from source for verifiable history.
rules.active_investigation: Verify artifact existence on localhost before inclusion.
rules.dual_referencing: Reference both localhost paths and remotehost URLs.
rules.audit_trail_linking: Daily session WeDos MUST link to specific project WeDos to maintain a forensic audit trail.
rules.output_location: All initial WeDo narrative outputs (drafts, reports, journals) MUST be placed in the 'md/wedo/' directory of the daily chrono-fractal structure.
rules.finalization_protocol: The goal is to refine 'md/wedo/' artifacts into permanent Heartwood in 'md/'. This transition (and renaming) occurs ONLY upon an explicit 'straightup' request from the user (HAM prompt).
rules.versioning_archival: When updating Markdown documents, always rename the previous version and move it to the local context/ directory (e.g., <AGENT>_<SESSION>_<NAME>_v<OLD>.md) before establishing the new version in the primary md/ location.

tasks.description: Audit all json/wedo/ templates against the Golden Rules.
Synchronize schema updates across all active WeDo instances.
